[File: aptos-core/network/discovery/src/rest.rs] [Function: poll_next()] [Network ID Bypass] Can extract_validator_set_updates be called with incorrect network_context, causing testnet validators to be injected into mainnet discovery or vice versa? (High)

[File: aptos-core/network/discovery/src/rest.rs] [Function: new()] [Interval Bounds Check] Does new() validate that interval_duration is within reasonable bounds (not too small causing spam, not too large causing staleness), or can misconfiguration lead to discovery failures? (Medium)
